page.title: 12Amenities
page.content: There is a variety of youth clubs linked to the schools or churches, where children can take part in sporting or recreational activities. Further social activities, for all ages, are linked to the four churches in Whitburn. The area has several sports fields, both private and public, where many activites can be pursued. Cornthwaite Park, which is triangular in shape, offers bowling, tennis, putting greens, as well as children's play areas, ponds and a one mile public footpath to the coast. It also provides car parking facilities. There is a Branch Library in the village centre - part of South Tyneside Libraries, and the service is well used.
